pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/TheTesla/dnsuptools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/TheTesla/dnsuptools)# DNSupToolsThis is a python library enabling easy dns server record updates. Currently onlyinwx.de is supported. This program library depends on pycurl. To use this you need:```bashsudo apt install libcurl4-openssl-dev libssl-dev```# ToDocomplete all tests!# AuthorStefan Helmert
